title: BONUS episode with Kim Constable (The Hectic Teacher)
description: In this episode, Matthew interviews Kim Constable, an A-level sociology better known as the Hectic teacher on how she became a Sociology teacher and her immense collection of varied resources.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew interviews Kim Constable, an A-level sociology better known as the Hectic teacher on how she became a Sociology teacher and her immense collection of varied resources.
